programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom Sunday
programme.desc: Updates of the latest news from around the world.

programme.title: U.S. State of the Union Address
programme.desc: The Speech is addressed to the Congress and the American people. It aims to highlight administration work and its victories, target political enemies and demonstrate the Presidents vision for the whole country.

programme.title: Fareed Zakaria GPS
programme.desc: Weekly public affairs show hosted by an American journalist, political scientist, and author Fareed Zakaria. The show is broadcasted on CNN every Sunday in many countries of the world. The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: The Amanpour Hour
programme.desc: Christiane Amanpour, CNNs chief international anchor, brings valuable insight to the biggest global and domestic news stories of the week.

programme.title: CNN This Morning
programme.desc: The latest news and information from around the world. Don Lemon, Poppy Harlow, and Kaitlan Collins host.

programme.title: CNN News Central
programme.desc: News. The core hub of the networks best newsgathering operation during the day, bringing stories to viewers in real time, while offering perspective and context to key issues using innovative technology and storytelling tools.

programme.title: Amanpour
programme.desc: Global affairs programme in which host Christiane Amanpour analyses some of the most relevant stories from around the world, often adding her personal experiences. She also interviews a variety of notable, high-profile people and key players from various fields.

programme.title: What We Know with Max Foster
programme.desc: Max Foster has a definitive roundup of the days top stories, giving you the urgent need-to-know context, plus a deeper dive into the questions sparking debate around the world.

programme.title: The Brief with Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNNs reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Hosted by Erin Burnett, an expert in political science and economics, OutFront is an hour-long news programme examining the latest stories from the US and further afield. Broadcast live from either the New York studio or live on location from the site of a breaking story, the show features insightful opinions from informed guests. With expert analysis from CNNs correspondents and analysis from the shows panel, Erin Burnett OutFront dissects the stories of the day, leaving no stone unturned. Burnett, a former financial analyst for Goldman Sachs, uses her forthright approach to engage interviewees in honest discussion.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper delves into the days news, looking beyond the broadcast to give his take, prompting us to re-think what we hear in the headlines. Cooper has covered major, international stories like the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina on the Gulf Coast, the catastrophic BP oil spill and the 2010 earthquake in Haiti, which saw the whole world fall silent. The show has won an absolute plethora of awards over the years, including GLAAD Media and Emmy awards.

programme.title: The Source with Kaitlan Collins
programme.desc: Kaitlan Collins goes straight to the source for the best reporting on the days biggest stories.

programme.title: CNN NewsNight
programme.desc: Magazino. Current affairs show with Abby Phillip.

programme.title: Laura Coates Live
programme.desc: Magazino. Current affairs show.

programme.title: The Story Is: With Elex Michaelson
programme.desc: Elex Michaelson tackles the breaking stories making headlines with sharp analysis, fresh perspective, and a dose of humor.

programme.desc: Global affairs programme in which host Christiane Amanpour analyses some of the most relevant stories from around the world, often adding her personal experiences. She also interviews a variety of notable, high-profile people and key players from various fields.

programme.desc: The ladies of Vegas put the tow drivers to the test: Pineapple fends off a busload of bachelorettes, and Kyle has an encounter with a showgirl.

programme.title: Sin City Tow

programme.title: Border Control Sweden
programme.desc: Niklas talks to a man who really doesnt remember how many units of alcohol he is bringing. Tomas takes the time to teach a lesson at Arlanda.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain
programme.desc: Going through customs can be a stressful experience for most people, even more so if youre attempting to smuggle drugs or weapons into the country. Follow the efforts of the Security and Customs Services at the border of Spain, as they work hard to keep their country safe from criminals. Whether its drugs, weapons or even terrorism, theres a lot of things security have to consider in order to make sure all threats are handled properly. These security forces are always hot on the trail of suspicious activity, in the air, on land or away at sea.

programme.title: Border Control: Spain

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: Homes vanish underwater, residents cling to rooftops, and rescuers battle rising floods in Floridas deadliest hurricane in nearly 100 years.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. We take a look at how things work, and focus on some of the most amazing examples of everyday objects including the worlds fastest elevator and the most expensive chocolate money can buy.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: The Pool Master
programme.desc: The Pool Master is a show presented by Anthony Archer-Wills, a top pool expert, landscape architect and artist. Team of professionals lead by him design and build amazing one-of-a-kind pools, which are in great demand among homeowners. After seeing masterpiece by Anthony, you will never agree to have a rectangle with water for swimming. Multipurpose pools for exercising and entertainment full of flowers, waterfalls, decorated with natural stone according to every taste and wallet will take your breath away.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Deadliest Catch
programme.desc: A documentary chronicling real life the adventures of one of the most deadliest professions in the world. Follow Alaskan crab fishermen as they face 40-foot waves and intense discomfort with freezing temperatures as they fish in the Bering sea. Sacrificing tooth and nail to catch the seasonal delicacies to later sell and trade on land. Witness the dangers these fisher men face as they battle against the sea, and experience how caution is a crucial part of staying alive.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Garage Rehab
programme.desc: American petrol head and reality TV star, Richard Rawlings, famous for his show Fast N Loud, visits struggling garages and car workshops that are desperate for a helping hand. Alongside the team of world-class mechanics from his Gas Monkey Garage, Richard invests his precious time and money to get these toiling businesses back where they belong. The team visit workshops all over the USA, using their knowledge and experience to rev up the old girls and get their engines purring once more. With a serious amount of elbow grease on top of the help from Richards team, the owners have a shot once more at a successful business.

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: How Do They Do It? Ever wondered how the stripes get into toothpaste or how contact lenses are made? How do goods get from one country to another and then into our supermarkets? What are car tires made from and exactly why are plasma TV screens flat? Eating, drinking, driving, flying. These all are activities that we carry out with barely a second thought. But have you ever wondered what exactly goes into your teabag and how it got there? How does an airport handle hundreds of thousands of items of luggage each day? And just how can a cars airbag inflate so quickly? Every day – often without even realizing it – we come into contact with technology, be it in the bathroom, in the car or on the golf course. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Dual Survival
programme.desc: Dave and Cody join forces, taking on a lost hiker scenario in the jungles of Laos. The items given to them include things a backpacker may carry: a camera, condoms and cigarettes.

programme.title: Naked And Afraid Brazil
programme.desc: Extremely weak, the participants get to the final stage of the challenge. The journey to the extraction point is long and plagued by difficulties.

programme.title: Maritime Masters: Expedition Antarctica
programme.desc: Maritime Masters: Expedition Antarctica. S1/E10 - New Beginnings. With the discovery yachts journey coming to an end, the crew has thrilling surprises in store. They swim in icy waters and unveil a new vessel.

programme.title: Alaska: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: American reality series is about Alaskan pioneers Yule and Ruth Kilcher and their kids living together at their homestead. The Kilchers demonstrate one-of-a-kind model of surviving in severe conditions of the last frontier. Enjoy amazing panorama views of Alaska, showing its various nature. Sitting in a comfortable chair in your warm apartment just try to imagine how it really is when electricity and running water is not inevitable fact of life. The Kilchers hunt, go fishing, garden, gather, raise livestock in order to survive Alaskas uncontrollable power and wilderness.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Railroad Alaska
programme.desc: Following an elite crew of workers-- brakemen, engineers, construction crews, mechanics and train drivers – RAILROAD ALASKA illustrates the battle against ferocious weather and treacherous terrain to keep the State of Alaskas critical 500-mile long railroad rolling to deliver life sustaining supplies. From controlled avalanches to prevent catastrophe, to fascinating characters, like Jim James, the one-handed handy man, learn what it takes to keep this train on track.

programme.title: Border Control Italia
programme.desc: Follows the officers of the Security and Customs Services at the borders of Italy, which are under the constant threat from drugs, weapons, and suspected terrorists.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jared strikes a risky deal with a powerful businessman that will give him exclusive rights to the Forever Claim... if it doesnt bleed him dry first.

programme.title: Gold Rush: Parkers Trail
programme.desc: Following on from his earlier adventures prospecting for gold in the contiguous 48 states, Gold Rush: Parkers Trail focuses on the further exploits of presenter Parker Schnabel as he attempts to make new discoveries in other areas. With his companion, Rick Ness, Schnabel endeavours to travel the deadly Klondike Trail over the Chilkoot Pass and up the Yukon River to Dawson City tracing the steps of the 1897 Gold Rush prospectors. Other series take Schnabel on a hiking and mining undertaking in Guyana; to Papua New Guinea where they sail, fly, hike and drive to reach their destination; and to Australia, the island nation that experienced several gold rushes from 1851 onwards.

programme.title: The Last Woodsmen
programme.desc: Jared strikes a risky deal with a powerful businessman that will give him exclusive rights to the Forever Claim... if it doesnt bleed him dry first.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears explores the Great Barrier Reef starting on the Queensland mainland taking a boat out to Hervey Bay with whale expert Wally Franklin. They witness a mother hump back whale teaching her three month old calf the whale moves needed to survive the long migration to Antarctica.He flies out to Lady Elliot Island at the southernmost tip of the Great Barrier Reef where he goes scuba diving on the coral reef and discovers giant turtles and manta rays and shoals of big eyed trevelly fish.Back on the island Ray helps marine biologist Maggie ONeal plant a Pisonia tree and finds out how the Pisonia trees kill the Black Noddy birds that nest in them in order to use their corpses as a fertile compost given the unforgiving ground of a coral island.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: Ray Mears journeys into the remote wilderness region of Arnhem land to the Cooper Creek Billabong. Hes there during the dry season and all the wild life is concentrated into a narrow stretch of water. He comes face to face with the dominant saltwater crocodile and watches as the croc manoeuvres a dead pig down river to a secret hiding place. When Ray gets too close warns him off.Ray travels into Stone Country above the Billabong where he finds a gallery of ancient Aboriginal art and joins locals Connie Nayinggul and her grandson Moses on a fishing expedition. They catch a barramundi and cook the fish in a traditional ground oven using paper bark.Finally Ray travels with land manager Greg Towns across the dried up mudflats through giant flocks of Magpie Geese. Ray helps Greg to burn away large meadows of alien and destructive grass that is killing the birds. In a dramatic scene Ray witnesses the spectacle of farming with fire.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial - a predator - that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia - a Tiger Quoll - smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Federica the turtle has arrived from Italy after a run in with a container ship. Loro Parques offered to be her forever home, but how will she go sharing her new digs with others? Youve heard of a fish out of water - try a turtle! Esmeralda the iguana has a lumpy belly and Jorge the vet is worried. Hes hoping its a bounty of eggs but knows he shouldnt count his iguanas before they hatch. Its fingers crossed for some scaly babies!

programme.title: Animal Embassy
programme.desc: Hes known as the "Birdman of Loro Parque" and Rafa, the Loro Parque Foundation Scientific Director wears the badge with pride. Every day he surrounds himself with all things ornithological - from parrots and puffins to penguins. But its what hes carrying through the zoo that brings all the birds to the yard. Any guesses? Youve heard of the film "How to train your Dragon" - today Inaki has to try and train an anteater (and hes not sure whats proving easier)! With anteaters being the stubborn but sensitive types, Inakis digging deep into his bag of tricks - beginning with the old favourite, some vanilla yoghurt. Will Sue-Anne the anteater succumbs to Inakis tasty charms or will she thumb her (rather long) nose at him instead?

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Hosted by Gary Sinise, the final toast of the Doolittle Tokyo Raiders honored the few surviving WWII veterans of the daring 1942 mission over Japan. With a bottle of 1896 Hennessy Cognac uncorked, they raised silver goblets one last time. Led by Lt. Col. James Doolittle, these aviators boosted American morale after Pearl Harbor. Their legacy lives on, even as their numbers have faded.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: From the elite ex-special forces personnel in charge of guarding heads of state in conﬂ ict zones to the two-person teams that protect CEOs in dangerous regions, modern-day bodyguards must be well versed in close quarter battle techniques. An immense amount of planning and preparation is involved in each operation. From air travel, car convoys and helicopter shuttles to basic foot traﬃc, a close protection squad must be completely tuned to the Who, What, Where and When of any given situation. This episode of CQB focuses on the complex day-to-day and minute-to-minute operations of these elite teams and the highly developed techniques they employ.

programme.title: Wax in the City
programme.desc: Africa is in fashion! Its flag? Wax print, which more and more Franco-African designers are choosing to incorporate into their creations. Flora Coquerel, a Franco-Beninese woman and the winner of MissFrance 2014, invites us to follow them in their intense and globalised life for a success story - how the colours of a simple fabric have become the symbol of the cultural melting pot of an entire generation!

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Learn the secrets behind THERMOS amazing technology! And they were the sweet candy pellets we loved as a kid, but did you know that PEZ was created to help people stop smoking? And find out how a steamboat inspired SAMUEL LANGHORNE CLEMENS to change his name to MARK TWAIN!

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters continue their investigation of Knutsford Crown Court. As they delve deeper into the building, will the ghosts and spirits make contact through Derek?

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Carnfield Hall is a country house dating from the 15th and 16th Centuries. This private residence turn event hall is using its paranormal activity to draw in business. Are these spirits the old residents?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We travel to the end of the rainbow in Dublin, Ireland. Well gawk at the Book of Kells, a holy book displayed at Trinity College. We visited the hallowed halls of St. Patricks Cathedral, and touched famed Irishman, Daniel OConnells crypt at Glasnevin Cemetery. Finally, we learn the complicated history of Irish independence at Kilmainham jail.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: One of the 7 Natural Wonders of the World, Victoria Falls is an amazing spectacle that straddles the Zambia/Zimbabwe border. The force of the water is so intense that the water bouncing back creates a rainforest. Remarkably, the wildlife in the area is as abundant as the water going over the falls.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Once a year in good rain years, the deserts of South Africa explode in color. This is the greatest flower bloom in the world. We venture into the desert to experience this first-hand and film the rare animals that call this arid land home.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Its island living in the Keys on this episode of TTH. We learn about the islands treasure hunting history at the Mel Fisher Museum. Then well explore Fort Jefferson, an isolated fort in the Gulf of Mexico that defended the islands. American literature enthusiasts will enjoy a look at Ernest Hemingways Key West home, where some of his most famous works were penned.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We head underground and visit the Hidee Gold Mine to see how this most precious material is obtained. Then we get a tour of the brand new History Colorado Center where well explore Colorados past through first hand stories and interactive attractions.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Our solar system is vast, from our own star the Sun to Earth is nearly 150 million kilometers or 1 Astronomical Unit. Jupiter is 5.2 AU distant and Pluto up to 48AU, the solar system extends far beyond this into interstellar space. We humans cannot yet travel that sort of distance, however w e can and do send our robots and probes in our place; and the results are astounding.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere. If so one space program would have to remain. The planetary defence program, to locate identify and deflect a wayward asteroid from hitting Earth and destroying our civilzation because at last count there were 15,000 possible dangerous candidates close to Earth.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: They manage to fly over the first hills of the Chilean mountain range, but fail and fall in a small town and must be rescued. Next to the pilot Cristian Millas we will fly in the Chilean precordillera, aboard a modern hot air balloon.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Its been sweetening America for almost 40 years! Now, find out the truth behind how SWEET N LOW actually got its name! And why do we yell SHOTGUN when getting into a car with friends? Then, is it really bad luck to open an umbrella in the house? And, learn the salty truth on how the POTATO CHIP was invented out of ANGER!

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Mongolia, Steppes Emirate
programme.desc: Battered by strong winds, and seen as a grazing land, Mongolia is the kingdom of steppes. With important mineral resources such as copper or uranium, coal and rare soil, Mongolia future is secure: the economy shows a significant growth rate and it is a business paradise for some expatriates. But for most of the population, needs remain unfulfilled.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. The northern, windward side receives three fourths of all precipitation, which is why it is green year round. The significant differences in elevation also contribute to the great contrasts, as do the mountain ranges extending through the middle of the island. You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Life on planet Earth is a fragile enough proposition as it is. The Earth is an interconnected system, everything is dependent on everything else, and we as a species should learn how to avoid making things worse than they need to be. In this rather sobering instalment of Desperate Hours our special focus is on Environmental Disasters. We will explore what has actually been done to protect the environment in contrast to the long discussions on this topic. From polluting the planet in various ways to the effects of global warming we contemplate how our future might be affected. As custodians of the planet, are we not better to be safe, rather than sorry?

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Volcanoes, earthquakes, tidal waves, and fires. Cataclysmic events that are capable of wiping out thousands of lives in a terribly short space of time. Then there are epidemics and pandemics, particularly chilling in their own way, because they literally and figuratively get under the skin. Lets not forget man-made disasters, the industrial accidents and environmental disasters that highlight all that is worst about our presence on this fragile blue green planet. And what is more frightening than a nuclear calamity? Accidents on the road, on rail, in the air and at sea, well, may not have quite the same deadly power as volcanoes or earthquakes; but they hold their own terrors, and are responsible for 1000s of fatalities every year. In this sobering yet thrilling final instalment of Desperate Hours we will take a look at some of the worst of the worst.

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: Yemen, Chaos in Silence
programme.desc: After three years of war, Yemen is facing its worst humanitarian crisis since the end of World War II. Yemen, chaos in silence"" is an unprecedented journey that tells the story of a conflict that is unfolding virtually without outside witnesses. From Aden in the south to Sanaa in the north, via Taez, the front line, this film explores a devastated country, eroded by political and religious divisions and ravaged by cholera.

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Stockport and investigate an abandoned Mil, Weir Mill, said to the most haunted Mill in the UK. Demonic figures haunt anyone that enters. Will the team survive the night with the spirits?

programme.title: Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team head to Tutbury Castle in Derbyshire to investigate the paranormal reports at the location. Past Hunters appear to have caught the Tutbury Ghost on camera.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Marvel at the site of Americas most famous water dam. Well learn about how the Hoover Dam was built, why its necessary, and take a behind the scenes look at its inner workings.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: Bill Ball breaks the rules and stereo types of travel shows as he ventures beyond the highlights. What do you do after youve lead groups to over 140 countries and all 7 continents? Welcome to Bills bucket list on steroids... Travel Quest. This new, fast-paced series chases Bill around the globe as he seeks out anything but the mundane and ordinary—coming face-to-face with the largest crocodiles in the world, snorkeling with thousands of jellyfish, walking on the rim of an exploding volcano, feeding a group of sharks without a cage, bicycling across the Serengeti... this is not your typical travel show!

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: The question often rises is the cost of space exploration really worth it? Could the money be better spent elsewhere. If so one space program would have to remain. The planetary defence program, to locate identify and deflect a wayward asteroid from hitting Earth and destroying our civilzation because at last count there were 15,000 possible dangerous candidates close to Earth.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: For an instrument first developed as recently as the 17th century, the telescope has travelled a long way. The latest version of the once-humble telescope will be going a lot farther - carrying us ever closer to the first light that ever bathed the Universe in which we live.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: The Great Journey
programme.desc: They manage to fly over the first hills of the Chilean mountain range, but fail and fall in a small town and must be rescued. Next to the pilot Cristian Millas we will fly in the Chilean precordillera, aboard a modern hot air balloon.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: It powers the machinery of nature; our weather, encourages and sustains life on land and at sea. When it sets in the West it reveals to us its many billions of sibling stars populating the night sky. We study our Sun closely, and like a Rosetta stone it can reveal the secrets of all the other stars above.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Brazils Coastlines
programme.desc: A series to celebrate Brazil and its diversity. We will explore the beauty and richness of the 8000 kilometer-long coasts, focusing on their natural and geographical aspects but also on its economic and cultural facets. An exciting journey blending the best aerial shots with stunning photography across the country to reveal both a cultural and human portrait.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. The northern, windward side receives three fourths of all precipitation, which is why it is green year round. The significant differences in elevation also contribute to the great contrasts, as do the mountain ranges extending through the middle of the island. You can experience large differences in temperature on Tenerife, especially in the winter months- you can swim and sunbathe on the southern beaches, while its freezing and snowing on the summit of Teide.

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: During his trip to Uruguay, Sorin Mihailovici threw a new dart at the world map and hit Cuba in a dreamy setup. This episode represents a refreshing way of looking at things in the beautiful country, which endured too much over the last decades. Sorin starts in Havana and introduces the viewer to the famous classic cars, explaining why they are so many and whats so special about them. He then takes a trip to Vinales, the worlds most-renown area when it comes to producing cigars. You get to see how the high-sought Cuban cigars are made, from start to finish, as Sorin receives unprecedented access to a tobacco plantation and discovers the process of making the cigars, from seeds to consumption. The episode also features a visit to Ernest Hemingways favorite spot in Havana, La Bodeguita del Medio, where the famous American author got inspired to write most of his pieces.

programme.title: Dream Journey
programme.desc: February 2017 saw me embark upon a travel expedition through Scotland, Poland, France, Mexico, Belize and, (alas!), back. Not only was it the first time I ventured out to Central America, but also the first time I seriously pushed my bravery boundaries to do a whole lot of things Id never tried before. I defeated my life-long fear of scubadiving and skydiving, (the Carribbean vistas do help! - No danger Id do that again in Aberdeen), I went zip-lining over a Mexican jungle, I tried habanero-packed streetfood, (failed at that miserably), and organic tequila, (managed that better;), I climbed a Maya pyramid in the middle of a Belizean rainforest and fed hibiscus flowers to a very extravagant donkey. Most importantly, however, I got to know some incredible people - from shamans, wanderers and artists to refugees, businesswomen and expat cowboys. And thanks to aaaall of that, I also got to know a little bit more about myself for visiting the most remote corners of our planet reminds you how different and yet how similar we all are. Im looking forward to sharing my incredible experience in 5 exciting episodes of our travel series, which really turned out to be a Dream Journey:) I simply cannot wait for more!

programme.title: Travel By Dart
programme.desc: While blindfolded in Cambodia, Sorin threw the dart at the world map and hit Thailand ("the Land of Smiles"). An incredible journey that spreads throughout two episodes, this adventure features everything you need to know about Thailand and its culture. The first part showcases Bangkok and its crazy good vibe and balances modern times with history. Sorin meets Yvonne, a Brit who came to Thailand to visit the famous River Kwai Bridge, not for tourism, but to track her fathers footsteps. The old man was a Prisoner of War here during the World War II during the bridge building, and now Sorin and his friend are looking for clues about his ordeal. A significant breakthrough takes place.

programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: Tenerife is the largest and most diverse of the seven Canary Island. It is home to Spains highest mountain - Pico del Teide with an elevation of nearly 4OOO meters. Tenerife includes an incredible ten defined climate zones!!! There are substantial differences between the north and the south of the island. programme.title: European Islands
programme.desc: The European islands are renowned primarily for their hotel resorts. However, we will show you a completely different face of theirs: forests, beaches, coves, mountains, valleys and rivers. Perhaps you will find places that will take your breath away. Why just lie on the beach when there is so much to see? Put on some good hiking shoes, pull your shoelaces tight, and get to know the entire island like the back of your hand.

programme.title: Costa Rica: Wildlife under the Rainbow
programme.desc: The tropical climate and varied topography of the Costa Rica have fostered exceptional biodiversity, with wildlife from both North and South America. From the peaks of volcanoes down to the Pacific and Caribbean shores, lets discover the life of 90 of the most remarkable mammals, beautiful birds, and astonishing reptiles…

programme.title: Fragrance and Emotions
programme.desc: Unique documentary that takes you to discover the secret of some of the most luxurious perfumes and emblematic fragrances in the world. Visit the famous city of Grasse to meet the creators, the beautiful flower fields and all the incredible emotional powers of the Perfume.

programme.title: The Boy From the Wild
programme.desc: Growing up on a Game Reserve meant to help wildlife get out of captivity, it shares how it began and how Peter Meyer survived some incredible moments in the wild.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Šī sērija atklāj nelegālās cilvēku tirdzniecības pasauli.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Elitāra privātskola tiek kritizēta par gadu desmitiem senām apsūdzībām par audzēkņu seksuālu izmantošanu, ko veic tās darbinieki. Kā pieaugs upuru un vainīgo skaits? Un cik dziļa bija šo faktu piesegšana?

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Ceļā uz lidostu 19 gadus vecā Keitlina Akensa negaidīti piestāj Virdžīnijas tirdzniecības centrā un… pazūd. Policija veic izmeklēšanu par viņas mīļotajiem un sāk aizdomās turēt kādu no pazudušās tuvajiem, kas varētu zināt vairāk nekā saka.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Nakts vidū savās mājās Klīrvoterā Floridā pazūd astoņus gadus vecais Zakerijs Bernhards. Viņa māte bija uz brīdi devusies īsā peldē uz dzīvokļu kompleksa peldbaseinu, bet, pārnākot mājās, Zakerijs nebija savā gultā. Tāpat nebija atrodamas ielaušanās pazīmes..

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Nakts vidū savās mājās Klīrvoterā Floridā pazūd astoņus gadus vecais Zakerijs Bernhards. Viņa māte bija uz brīdi devusies īsā peldē uz dzīvokļu kompleksa peldbaseinu, bet, pārnākot mājās, Zakerijs nebija savā gultā. Tāpat nebija atrodamas ielaušanās pazīmes..

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Iesācēju CSI uzdevums ir atrast pierādījumus no vardarbīgas saduršanas, un tiesu medicīnas zinātnieki strādā kopā, lai identificētu divus izvarošanā aizdomās turamos un ar DNS saistītu viņus ar noziegumu.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Policija meklē dīvaina izskata uzbrucēju, kurš redzēts bēgam pēc jaunas mātes nošaušanas. Viņi atklāj aizdomās turamo, kurš nav tas, ko viņi gaida — ar motīvu, kuru nav iespējams aptvert.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ar piecu gadu starpību tiek seksuāli izmantotas un nožņaugtas divas jaunas sievietes. Abas lietas vieno viens un tas pats nezināmais DNS. Kad abu gadījumu izmeklēšana nonāk strupceļā, Ņujorkas pilsētas un štata policijas 17 gadus vēlāk apvieno spēkus, lai atrastu slepkavu.

programme.title: Luīze Vudvorda – slepkava vai upure?
programme.desc: Pirms 25 gadiem, 1997. gadā, pasauli satricināja tiesas prāva, kurā Luīze Vudvorda, 18 gadus veca "au pair" auklīte no Lielbritānijas, kas strādāja Bostonā ASV, tika apsūdzēta un notiesāta par mazuļa nogalināšanu. Prokurors apgalvoja, ka mazulis miris no spēcīgas kratīšanas. Tagad Luīze ir pusmūžā, audzina savu meitu, un kaimiņi par viņu saka, ka viņa ir tāda pati māmiņa kā citas. 2022. gadā uzņemtais britu dokumentālais miniseriāls izrevidē tiesas prāvas gaitu un jautā, cik taisnīgs bija tiesas spriedums.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: 38 gadus vecais Ēriks Lī Frenks no Mičiganas uz Ohaio pārcēlās 2013. gadā. Tur viņš satika savu pusaugu meitu, par kuru neko līdz tam nezināja. 6 mēnešus vēlāk viņa māte Mičiganā ziņoja par dēla pazušanu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Pusaugu meiteni parkā izvaro pilnīgs svešinieks — vai digitālā un tradicionālā kriminālistika var strādāt kopā, lai sauktu pie atbildības galveno aizdomās turamo?

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Pēc 50 gadiem Čārlza Mensona stāsts ir kļuvis par leģendu, bet - kas ir fakts un kas izdomājums? Aizmirstiet visu dzirdēto, jo "Helter Skelter" ienirs vēl neizstāstītā stāstā par 20. gadsimta sensacionālāko slepkavību sēriju.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Braitonbīčā pazūd ukraiņu imigrants. Tiesībaizsardzības iestāžu labāko aģentu komanda no Ņujorkas policijas, ASV prokurora biroja un FIB sadarbojas, lai noskaidrotu notikušo.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Balto pārākuma dusmas mudina kādu jaunekli 2015. gadā Čārlstonā noslepkavot deviņus melnādainus baznīcas apmeklētājus. Tas motivē izraisīt sprādzienu un nogalināt musulmaņu bēgļus Kanzasā. Varas iestādes vēlas zināt, ar ko tas beigsies.

programme.desc: 38 gadus vecais Ēriks Lī Frenks no Mičiganas uz Ohaio pārcēlās 2013. gadā. Tur viņš satika savu pusaugu meitu, par kuru neko līdz tam nezināja. 6 mēnešus vēlāk viņa māte Mičiganā ziņoja par dēla pazušanu.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Pusaugu meiteni parkā izvaro pilnīgs svešinieks — vai digitālā un tradicionālā kriminālistika var strādāt kopā, lai sauktu pie atbildības galveno aizdomās turamo?

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Pēc 50 gadiem Čārlza Mensona stāsts ir kļuvis par leģendu, bet - kas ir fakts un kas izdomājums? Aizmirstiet visu dzirdēto, jo "Helter Skelter" ienirs vēl neizstāstītā stāstā par 20. gadsimta sensacionālāko slepkavību sēriju.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Braitonbīčā pazūd ukraiņu imigrants. Tiesībaizsardzības iestāžu labāko aģentu komanda no Ņujorkas policijas, ASV prokurora biroja un FIB sadarbojas, lai noskaidrotu notikušo.

programme.title: Luīze Vudvorda – slepkava vai upure?
programme.desc: Pirms 25 gadiem, 1997. gadā, pasauli satricināja tiesas prāva, kurā Luīze Vudvorda, 18 gadus veca "au pair" auklīte no Lielbritānijas, kas strādāja Bostonā ASV, tika apsūdzēta un notiesāta par mazuļa nogalināšanu. Prokurors apgalvoja, ka mazulis miris no spēcīgas kratīšanas. Tagad Luīze ir pusmūžā, audzina savu meitu, un kaimiņi par viņu saka, ka viņa ir tāda pati māmiņa kā citas. 2022. gadā uzņemtais britu dokumentālais miniseriāls izrevidē tiesas prāvas gaitu un jautā, cik taisnīgs bija tiesas spriedums.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Balto pārākuma dusmas mudina kādu jaunekli 2015. gadā Čārlstonā noslepkavot deviņus melnādainus baznīcas apmeklētājus. Tas motivē izraisīt sprādzienu un nogalināt musulmaņu bēgļus Kanzasā. Varas iestādes vēlas zināt, ar ko tas beigsies.

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Kad 15 gadus vecā Kaila Berga pēc naktsdzīves nav pārnākusi mājās, viņas mīļotie tic, ka viņa palikusi pie draugiem. Paiet sešas dienas, un atklājas, ka meitene pazudusi. Fakti par pazušanu raisa aizdomas nelielajā pilsētā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Tamara Moustafas izmeklēšana, kurš nogalināja savu sievu un kaimiņu, taču, kad tika nopratināts, par slepkavībām neko neatcerējās.

programme.title: Helter Skelter: Amerikāņu mīts
programme.desc: Helter Skelter bija visas nepieciešamās sastāvdaļas. Kā apstākļu vētra salauza jaunu zēnu un palīdzēja radīt vienu no visu laiku noslēpumainākajiem noziedzniekiem?

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Vientuļā māte Ingrīda Laina atgriezās randiņu pasaulē. Kad viņa tiešsaistē satiek vīrieti, viņš šķiet lielisks, taču tas, kas notika tālāk, pārvērtās par vienu no šausminošākajiem noziegumiem nesenajā vēsturē.

programme.title: Neredzamie briesmoņi: Sērijveida slepkavas Amerikā
programme.desc: Apvienojot piecu Amerikas bēdīgi slavenāko sērijveida slepkavu — Teda Bandija, Džona Veina Geisija, Džefrija Dāmera, Gērija Ridžveja un BTK — stāstus, noziegumiem vistuvākie cilvēki analizē savstarpēji saistītos sociālos faktorus, kas ļāva šiem slepkavām prasīt simtiem upuru, vienlaikus izvairoties no notveršanas.

programme.title: Vanity Fair: Konfidencionāli
programme.desc: Politiskā kandidāta meita Peru pazūd pēc nakts dzīves Limā. Vīrietis, ar kuru viņa pēdējo reizi redzēta dzīva, ir saistīts ar jaunas amerikānietes pazušanu 3000 jūdžu attālumā. Kādas nelietīgas shēmas dalībnieks ir šis vīrietis?

programme.title: Pazudis
programme.desc: Kad 15 gadus vecā Kaila Berga pēc naktsdzīves nav pārnākusi mājās, viņas mīļotie tic, ka viņa palikusi pie draugiem. Paiet sešas dienas, un atklājas, ka meitene pazudusi. Fakti par pazušanu raisa aizdomas nelielajā pilsētā.

programme.title: Kriminālistika: īstais CSI
programme.desc: Tamara Moustafas izmeklēšana, kurš nogalināja savu sievu un kaimiņu, taču, kad tika nopratināts, par slepkavībām neko neatcerējās.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Ričards Čabijs nomirst un pilsētā ierodas Mazais Čabijs, lai pārņemtu ģimenes biznesu. Pa to laiku Erls mēģina izsvītrot punktu no sava saraksta un atklāj patieso upurēšanās nozīmi.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls atklāj, ko nozīmē mācīt mazgadīgos noziedzniekus, kad lūdz palīdzību savam bijušajam vidusskolas skolotājam, lai dabūtu vispārējās izglītības diplomu.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Megija Laizere atgriežas - Maikls nejauši uzduras viņai tiesas zālē. Viņš saprot, ka viņa ir pēdējā grūtniecības mēnesī. Tas notiek pēc tam, kad Maikls mēģina tiekties pēc savas ilggadējās simpātijas Sallijas Sitvelas. Maikls nolemj lūgt Lindsijai un Tobiasam noskaidrot, vai viņa tiešām ir stāvoklī.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Lindsija un Tobiass turpina izmeklēt Megijas Laizeres noslēpumaino grūtniecību, bet Maikls turpina viņu tikties. Basters gatavojas doties uz Irāku, bet pirms tam nolemj doties ilgi atliktā rituālā - peldēties okeānā, kur ronis viņam nokoda roku.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds ir vienkāršs Amerikas pilsonis, viņš strādā par sporta žurnālistu un kopā ar savu burvīgo ģimeni dzīvo Longailendā. Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als veikalā cīnās ar citiem vīriem par pēdējā brīža Valentīndienas piedāvājumiem. Bads viesnīcā tiek fiziski un seksuāli izmantots, mēģinot atrast savu sen pazudušo, vidusskolas Valentīnu, kas tagad ir slavena popzvaigzne.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Buds nabaga Kelliju sūta savvaļas zosu vajāšanā, lai atrastu Valdo, kamēr viņš varētu izskriet no mājas, satiekoties ar kādu blondīni. Vienlaikus ar teju vai miljons jūdzēm odometrā, Als saņem neticamu piedāvājumu no uzņēmuma Dodge par pilnīgi jaunu Viper.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs sāk strādāt elektroiekārtu veikala kravu pārvadāšanas nodaļā. Bet Erls grib būt pārdevējs, kas rada problēmas ar viņa kolēģiem savā nodaļā un pārējiem pārdevējiem.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls ir liecinieks Džojas tiesas prāvā, bet viņš ātri vien saprot, ka Džoja tiks attaisnota tikai tad, ja viņš atzīsies noziegumā viņas vietā.

Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Lusila savervē Džordžu Maiklu, lai viņš ieņemtu Bastera vietu ikgadējās mātes un dēla vakariņās. Kamēr Maikls un Gobs rosīgi meklē roni, kas nokoda Bastera roku, Tobiass paraksta līgumu par ģimenes tiesībām, lai iegūtu lomu pie sava bijušā aktiermākslas trenera Karla Vetersa.

programme.title: Pidurdunud areng
programme.desc: Pēc draudzenes lūguma Džordžs-Maikls nolemj kandidēt uz klases prezidenta amatu, taču atklāj, ka nebūs viegli konkurēt ar savu sāncensi Stīvu Holtu. Maikls un Gobs atkal nonāk sacensībās, jo atklājas, ka Stīvs Holts ir Goba dēls.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Als iebilst pret ierosināto vecā vidusskolas futbola laukuma iznīcināšanu, lai tā vietā uzbūvētu jaunu automašīnu rūpnīcu (ko ierosināja Mārsija un Kioto banka), pieķēdējot sevi pie vārtu staba.

programme.title: Precējies... Ir bērni
programme.desc: Džefersons atklāj Mārsijai savu slepeno pagātni - viņš stāsta, ka ir bijušais CIP spiegs liecinieku aizsardzības programmā.

programme.title: Kailā pievilcība
programme.desc: Savdabīgs randiņu šovs, kurā cilvēki līdz ar mīlas peripetijām iepazīstas ar pakāpeniski atkalinātiem ķermeņiem. Pēcāk jāizģērbjas arī viņiem pašiem un jāizvēlas.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls un Rendijs sāk strādāt elektroiekārtu veikala kravu pārvadāšanas nodaļā. Bet Erls grib būt pārdevējs, kas rada problēmas ar viņa kolēģiem savā nodaļā un pārējiem pārdevējiem.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls ir liecinieks Džojas tiesas prāvā, bet viņš ātri vien saprot, ka Džoja tiks attaisnota tikai tad, ja viņš atzīsies noziegumā viņas vietā.

programme.title: Draugi
programme.desc: Seriāla galvenie varoņi ir seši draugi - Reičela, Monika, Fēbe, Džoijs, Čendlers un Ross, kuri dzīvo kaimiņos un regulāri nonāk aizraujošās un ļoti komiskās situācijās.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds ir vienkāršs Amerikas pilsonis, viņš strādā par sporta žurnālistu un kopā ar savu burvīgo ģimeni dzīvo Longailendā. Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls sāk izciest cietumsodu. Atrodoties apcietinājumā, viņš sastopas ar Doniju, kurš māca Erlam labāko veidu, kā palikt nepamanītam. Tikmēr Džoja un Darnels, Erlam esot prombūtnē, ir spiesti rūpēties par Rendiju.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: Erls uzsāk savu cietumsodu. Tikmēr Džoja mēģina atdarīt Erlam, rūpējoties par Rendiju, kuram ir grūti pielāgoties. Cietuma kauslis meklē Erlu.

Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Reimonds ir vienkāršs Amerikas pilsonis, viņš strādā par sporta žurnālistu un kopā ar savu burvīgo ģimeni dzīvo Longailendā. Reimonds dzīvi neuztver pārāk nopietni, viņš ar jokiem mēģina iziet no jebkuras dzīves situāciju, un visas rūpes par trim bērniem un sadzīvi labprāt uztic sievai Debrai. Debrai šāds vecmodīgs ģimenes modelis nav īsti pa prātam, tomēr Rejs spītīgi dod priekšroku sporta pārraidēm, nevis sarunām par laulības problēmām. Iespējams, ģimene sadzīvotu tīri labi, tomēr viņiem ir kaudze radinieku, kuri regulāri iegriežas ciemos, un visiem ir nodoklis par notiekošo. Tas, protams, nozīmē garantētus strīdus, nesaprašanās, pārpratumus un arī jautrību!

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Ofisā, kura darbinieki nodarbojas ar papīra pārdošanu un piegādi, viss ir tāpat kā lielākajā daļā pasaules ofisu - tajā ir boss, tajā ir dažādi darbinieki, no kuriem dažs labs vien darbu tikai imitē, un starp visiem izveidojušās ofisa attiecības tādā kā piespiedu kārtā - labākas un arī ne tik labas. Kā jau ar kolēģiem. Ofisa vadītājs Maikls, kuru attēlo slavenais aktieris un komiķis Stīvs Karels, savus darbiniekus ik dienas cenšas iesaistīt savos izgudrotajos jokos un uzdevumos. Viņš pats domā, ka ir pasaules labākais boss, ko apliecina krūzīte ar uzrakstu - "Pasaules labākais boss". Diemžēl šo krūzīti viņš sev nopircis pats. Maikls cenšas būt draudzīgs pret saviem darbiniekiem, tomēr lielākā daļa viņa joku ir rasistiski, šovinistiski vai citādi aizskaroši.

programme.title: Ofiss

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes. Turpretī Alans ir īsts neveiksminieks – no viņa ir izšķīrusies sieva, kura ir paturējusi sev abu kopīgi iegādāto māju, un Alans nespēj savilkt kopā galus, lai samaksātu rēķinus. Tā kā Alanam nav pa kabatai atļauties savu mājokli, viņš lūdz Čārlijam atļauju padzīvot pie viņa kādu laiciņu, kamēr apradīs ar jauno situāciju un atradīs pats savu mājvietu. Viņi pat nenojauta, uz cik ilgu laiku tas ievilksies un cik daudz jautrības tas sagādās skatītājiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Divi brāļi nevarētu būt dažādāk –: Čārlijam ir viss, ko dzīvē var vēlēties: nauda, skaista māja okeāna piekrastē, pavisam nedaudz darāmā un neskaitāmas draudzenes.
