programme.title: Gudrs, vēl gudrāks
programme.desc: Mēs varam būt brīvi un laimīgi, jo mūsu vecāki un vecvecāki pirms 35 gadiem uz barikādēm nosargāja Latviju. Faktus par šo Latvijas vēstures lappusi noteikti uzdosim arī spēles "Gudrs, vēl gudrāks" 9. klašu trešā pusfināla dalībniekiem. Lūk, divpadsmit dalībnieki: Ance Enija Salcēviča (Dundagas vidusskola), Henrijs Grīnbergs (Rīgas Juglas vidusskola), Elza Kurmiņa (Rīgas Valsts vācu ģimnāzija), Gabriela Paisuma (Rīgas Valsts 2. ģimnāzija), Katrīna Leščinska (Lielvārdes pamatskola), Kristers Jermacāns (Kocēnu pamatskola), Kristiāns Pundurs (Līvānu 1. vidusskola), Madara Akmene (Rīgas Iļģuciema pamatskola), Marks Daniēls Olekšs (Dobeles Valsts ģimnāzija), Artūrs Bincis (Rīgas Centra humanitārā vidusskola), Ralfs Ezītis (Ķekavas vidusskola), Valērija Vizbule (Jelgavas Valsts ģimnāzija). Muzikāls priekšnesums šoreiz no dziedātājas Āriya - dziesma "Nosnigt".

programme.title: Zemes stāsti
programme.desc: Viņa ir cilvēks ar teicamnieces sindromu. Izdarīt vairāk, nekā vari un pienākums prasa. Viņa sabruka un atgriezās laukos. Tur, kur vecāki bija uzcēluši siltumnīcas stadionu lielumā. Viņa izdziedināja sevi ar rozēm, pat ja tās atstāja rētas uz rokām. Viņai nav ambīciju būt lielākajiem vai labākajiem - viņai ir bail izniekot laiku, neko nedarot. Šis zemes stāsts būs par atbildi uz jautājumu: kā ir jāmīl mūsu zeme?

programme.title: No pusvārda
programme.desc: TV spēle.

programme.title: No pusvārda
programme.desc: TV spēle.

programme.title: Mīlestības vārdā
programme.desc: Pieci seniori – Fila, Kens, Toms, Deivids un Meriona – pēc ilgiem laikiem satiekas kopīga drauga bērēs. Pieminot aizgājēju krodziņā ar simbolisku nosaukumu "Mīlētāju mezgls", viens no draugiem, Toms, izsaka neprātīgu domu: lai nebūtu jācieš smagas slimības mokas un jābeidz dzīve aprūpes iestādē, draugi varētu palīdzēt cits citam izbeigt šīszemes ciešanas. Visi ir ar mieru un vienojas par šādu rīcību mīlestības vārdā. Pēc kāda laika izrādās, ka skurbuļa iespaidā noslēgtā vienošanās nav bijusi domāta kā joks.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Daiļslidošana. Eiropas čempionāts Šefīldā
programme.desc: Sievietēm pērn Eiropā čempiones godā bija jaunā igauniete Nīna Petrokina, kaut kopumā pasaulē mūsu kontinenta labākās daiļslidotājas nav galveno favorītu vidū. Pasaulē daudzām valstīm ir lielāks progress, īpaši Japānai, Dienvidkorejai, Ķīnai, ASV un Kanādai. Pēdējos trijos gados Eiropā gan visstabilākā ir Gruzijas pārstāve Anastasija Gubanova, kas šajā laikā vienreiz ieguvusi titulu un divreiz bijusi otrā. Daiļslidošanā gan šī valstu pārstāvniecība ir visai nosacīta, Gubanova patiesībā ir krievu sportiste, kas dzimusi un trenējusies Toljati un tikai kopš 2021. gada pārstāv Gruziju.

programme.title: Vienmēr formā!
programme.desc: Deutsche Welle žurnāls

programme.title: Aizliegtais paņēmiens
programme.desc: Lai uzzinātu par kāda notikuma patiesajiem apstākļiem vai iesaistīto personu nodomiem, raidījuma "Aizliegtais paņēmiens" komanda informācijas iegūšanai izmanto visdažādākos izmeklējošās žurnālistikas paņēmienus un žanrus – eksperimentus, testus, provokācijas, padziļinātus pētījumus, arī anonīmas intervijas. Žurnālisti padziļināti pēta un skatītājiem atklāj sociālpolitiskus tematus, kas ne vienmēr tiek izcelti citos medijos. Raidījums atklāj un atmasko, atsevišķos gadījumos sauc pie atbildības iesaistītās personas, norāda uz likumu nepilnībām, aicina mainīt pastāvošo kārtību, ja tā ir pretrunā sabiedrības interesēm. Raidījumu vada LTV Ziņu dienesta žurnālists Guntis Bojārs.

programme.title: Mūsu barikāžu laiks
programme.desc: Mūsu barikāžu laiks - šodien jau mitoloģizēts, bet 1991. gada janvārī tautas vienotības un gara spēka atmodas realitāte. Latvijas un visas Baltijas tautu griba pasaulē liecināja, ka Eiropā sevi piesaka trīs civilizētas tautas, kuras prasa atzīt savas tiesības. Kas bija šis fenomens? Romantiska aizrautība, liktenis, nolemtība, Dieva dāvana vai likumsakarība? Par to filmā runās gan politiķis, gan diplomāts, gan žurnālists, gan paši barikāžu sargi.

programme.title: Komisārs Reksis
programme.desc: Vīnē bieži pazūd cilvēki, tomēr vairums no tiem drīz vien laimīgi atrodas. Kriminālpolicijā nonāk divu pazudušu sieviešu lietas - viņas vēl nav atrastas ne dzīvas, ne mirušas. Brantnera komanda nonāk uz pēdām kādam viltīgam fotogrāfam, kurš ir saistīts ar šīm sievietēm, bet pierādījumu trūkuma dēļ viņu vēl nevar apcietināt. Izmeklētāji un Reksis ielenc iespējamo slepkavu arvien ciešākā lokā, cerot uz kaut nelielu viņa kļūmi.

programme.title: Šerifs
programme.desc: Kapteinis Kaders Šerifs ļoti mīl savu darbu policijā. Viņš dzīvo tieši pretī policijas iecirknim. Gadiem zināms kā radikālu izmeklēšanas metožu piekritējs, Kaders sastopas ar jauno kapteini, Kadera partneri Adelīnu Briāru. Abi pretpoli, kuri tik ļoti darbā pievelkas, izrādās visai dinamisks policistu pāris! Alžīriešu izcelsmes franču aktieris Abdelhafids Metalsi televīzijā strādā kopš 2000. gadu sākuma, un šarmantais kapteinis Kaders ir viņa līdz šim spilgtākā loma.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Policijas iecirknis
programme.desc: Seriāls "Policijas iecirknis 31" seko stāstam par detektīvseržanti Nadīnu Legrānu un viņas kolēģi Patriku Bisonē, kā arī citiem viņu biedriem policijas iecirknī, kur viņi sastopas ar ikdienas noziegumiem, kas notiek lielajās pilsētās: slepkavības, nolaupīšanas, ielaušanās, vardarbība ģimenē, narkotiku tirdzniecība, terorisms un daudz kas cits.

programme.title: Zinātnes noslēpumi
programme.desc: Dažādas mūsu ikdienā ierastas darbības un notikumi, izskaidroti no zinātnes viedokļa.

programme.title: Melnais saraksts
programme.desc: Kritiķu un skatītāju iemīļots kriminālseriāls. Tā darbība sākas dienā, kad darbu FIB galvenajā birojā Vašingtonā uzsāk jauna profilētāja Elizabete Kīna. Tajā pašā rītā tur ierodas viens no FIB meklētākajiem noziedzniekiem, Reimonds "Reds" Redingtons, un labprātīgi ļauj sevi notvert. Reds palīdz FIB sagūstīt citu bīstamu noziedznieku un novērst uzbrukumu civiliedzīvotājiem. Viņš paziņo, ka viņam esot vesels saraksts un informācija par tādiem noziedzniekiem un teroristiem, par kuru esamību FIB pat nenojauš. Reds ir gatavs sadarboties ar vienu savādu noteikumu – viņš runās tikai ar Elizabeti. Tā sākas īpašas attiecības, kuru īstā daba un iemesls ir zināmi tikai Redingtonam. Lai gan pamatā seriāla darbība norit ASV, tas aizved arī uz dažādām eksotiskām vietām visā pasaulē un ļauj ieskatīties kriminālajā pasaulē. Dažādiem apbalvojumiem vairāku gadu laikā izvirzīti seriāla specefektu veidotāji, kaskadieri un muzikālais noformējums.

programme.title: Ziemas karalis
programme.desc: Arturs aptver savu steigā pieņemto lēmumu sekas - nākotnē sagaidāms karš gan ar Povīsu, gan ar sakšiem. Nimve ir izraidīta uz Mirušo salu, un Dervels cenšas pierādīt, ka viņa nav vainīga. Arturam ir jāmācās uzticēties citiem un jāizdomā plāns, kā apstādināt sakšus. Tikmēr Dervels dodas bīstamā glābšanas misijā.

programme.title: Vienmēr formā!
programme.desc: Deutsche Welle žurnāls

programme.title: 700 pasaules brīnumi. Bosnija un Hercegovina
programme.desc: Iziet caur seniem pazemes labirintiem, satikt vienu no visneparastākajiem pasaules dzīvniekiem, ieraudzīt gadsimtiem vecas ūdens dzirnavas, uzrāpties uz jumta un palīdzēt iztīrīt dūmvadu vienīgajai Bosnijas skursteņslauķei - tā ir tikai daļa piedzīvojumu, kas jūs sagaida kopā ar "700 pasaules brīnumiem".

programme.title: 700 pasaules brīnumi. Bosnija un Hercegovina
programme.desc: Iziet caur seniem pazemes labirintiem, satikt vienu no visneparastākajiem pasaules dzīvniekiem, ieraudzīt gadsimtiem vecas ūdens dzirnavas, uzrāpties uz jumta un palīdzēt iztīrīt dūmvadu vienīgajai Bosnijas skursteņslauķei - tā ir tikai daļa piedzīvojumu, kas jūs sagaida kopā ar "700 pasaules brīnumiem".

programme.title: Zemes stāsti
programme.desc: Šie nebūs stāsti par lauksaimniecību – tie ir stāsti par mums pašiem, latviešiem. Par mūsu saknēm. Par saimniekiem savā zemē – kā darīt lietas pa īstam, no sirds. Arī tad, ja dzīve iesit pliķi sejā.

programme.title: Zemes stāsti
programme.desc: Šie nebūs stāsti par lauksaimniecību – tie ir stāsti par mums pašiem, latviešiem. Par mūsu saknēm. Par saimniekiem savā zemē – kā darīt lietas pa īstam, no sirds. Arī tad, ja dzīve iesit pliķi sejā.

programme.title: Kultūrdeva
programme.desc: Raidījumā "Kultūrdeva" viesosies Latvijas Radio bigbenda mākslinieciskais vadītājs Kārlis Vanags. Kopā atzīmēsim Maestro Raimonda Paula 90 gadu jubileju un pievērsīsimies viņa labākajai dāvanai sev - jaunajai džeza platei "Acumirkļi". Savukārt ar brāļiem Kristapu un Kasparu Zariņiem aprunāsimies par Latvijas Mākslas akadēmijas un mākslas jomas aktualitātēm.

programme.title: De facto
programme.desc: LTV Ziņu dienesta veidotajā analītiski pētnieciskajā raidījumā "De Facto" skatītājiem nozīmīgus jautājumus izmeklē žurnālisti Matīss Arnicāns, Inga Šņore, Laine Fedotova, Ivo Leitāns un Ella Semjonova. "De Facto" uzmanības lokā ir netaisnības un pretrunas – ne tikai korupcijas, interešu konfliktu un citu noziedzīgu nodarījumu lietas, bet arī sabiedrībai būtisku cieņpilnas attieksmes un ētiskas rīcības pārkāpumu izmeklēšana.

programme.title: Pasaules panorāma
programme.desc: Globālo ziņu laikmetā notikums Āzijā vai Amerikas kontinentā jau rīt var mainīt dzīvi Eiropā, bet lēmums, kas pieņemts Rīgā – atbalsoties visā pasaulē. "Pasaules panorāma" piedāvā neatkarīgas un uzticamas ziņas, atspoguļojot un analizējot ārpolitikas aktualitātes, kā arī sarunas ar politologiem, ārpolitikas ekspertiem, pasaulē pazīstamām personībām par svarīgāko Baltijā un Ziemeļvalstīs, citviet Eiropā, kā arī visā pasaulē. Raidījumu vada LTV Ziņu dienesta ārzemju ziņu redaktori Toms Pastors un Ina Strazdiņa.

programme.title: V.I.P. - Veiksme. Intuīcija. Prāts
programme.desc: "Veiksme. Intuīcija. Prāts" – vieta, kur jautājumi izaicina, atbildes pārsteidz un katra atbilde var nest uzvaru. Cikla pirmā pusfināla kapteiņi ir fiziskās sagatavotības treneris Edgars Aleksejevs un students Klāvs Grīnbergs. Edgars Aleksejevs – komandas kapteinis. Ikdienā strādā par fiziskās sagatavotības treneri. Edgaram ļoti nepatīk, ka cilvēki kavē. Ja katram cilvēkam ir kaitīgie ieradumi, tad Edgaram tā ir pārlieku lielā mīlestība pret glutēnu, konkrētāk – bulciņām. Mārtiņš Aleksejevs – kapteiņa brālis. Strādā par valsts aizsardzības mācības pasniedzēju. Viss brīvais laiks ir saistīts ar sportu. Skriešana, riteņbraukšana amatieru līmenī, zināšanas par sporta sasniegumiem ir diezgan iespaidīgas, patīk ģeogrāfija, zina valstu karogus. Mārtiņš joprojām nav atmetis domu kļūt par sporta žurnālistu. Rūdolfs Vertulaitis – kapteiņa draugs. Strādā par fizioterapeitu un fiziskās sagatavotības treneri. Rūdolfs uzskata, ka metāls ir ne tikai jānodod, bet arī jācilā un jāklausās. Tāpat viņš ir pārliecināts, ka fiziskā veselība ir fundamentāla lieta kvalitatīvai un ilgai dzīvei. Klāvs Grīnbergs – komandas kapteinis, students. Galvenās intereses ir ekonomika, datorzinātnes un psiholoģija, ko studē universitātē. Aktīvi seko līdzi sporta notikumiem basketbolā, futbolā, rallijā un Pirmajā formulā. Patīk garas pastaigas un atklātas sarunas ar draugiem. Patrīcija Barvika – komandas kapteiņa klasesbiedrene, nodarbojas ar šūšanu, apģērbu dizainu, keramiku un podniecību. Interesējas par literatūru, vēsturi un sociālajām zinātnēm. Brīvajā laikā apmeklē teātri un kino, kā arī seko līdzi Latvijas un pasaules sabiedriskajām aktualitātēm. Alise Jermaka – kapteiņa klasesbiedrene, studē medicīnas inženieriju un fiziku RTU. Ar prieku risina matemātikas un atjautības uzdevumus, lasa. Brīvajā laikā dejo, apmeklē izstādes, ceļo kopā ar draugiem un ģimeni.

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: An Italian supermarket under construction drastically collapsesy. Amusement parks become a lot less amusing when fires break out; Indias tunnel workers are trapped in a catastrophic collapse; Canadas light rail fails over and over again; and a stadium loses its lid to a hurricane. Plus, theres a look at how home constructions been misled by lead.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. How did the nuclear reactor at 3 Mile Island meltdown? How did a small truck fire in the Mt Blanc road tunnel become a lethal inferno? How did the seven year old Sampoong department store in South Korea collapse onto hundreds of shoppers?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did Apollo 13 really explode 200,000 miles from Earth? What caused the devastating fire that swept through the MGM Grand in Las Vegas? Why could the world famous Ponte Morandi bridge in Italy simply collapse and kill 43 people?

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Inside Airport: Lost and Found
programme.desc: A lone diamond from grandmas ring is lost at Pittsburghs airport by a young bride. Lost-and-found workers at Tampa International desperately try to find the owner of a fanny pack as it contains much-needed medication and $3,000 in cash. Travelers to a comic convention in Salt Lake City leave behind peculiar objects, including unique fan art acquired at the site.

programme.title: Inside Melbourne Airport
programme.desc: Brad and the ground services team have just 90 minutes to turn around an Air India flight for take-off. A kangaroo in the car park keeps ground transport manager Trent on his toes. Environment officer Dave discovers illegal bee hives within the airport precinct, and baggage handler Brodie battles carousel jams.

programme.title: Inside Sydney Airport
programme.desc: Operating under a noise curfew between 0600-2300 hours, the pressure is on at Sydney Airport to complete 900 plane movements in a day. Duty Manager George is confronted by a suspicious package. Meanwhile Rookie Mel suddenly has 2 medical emergencies in the space of an hour. And a freight handling crew have a problem with loading a bulging cargo pod.

programme.title: Toronto Airport Uncovered
programme.desc: Storms across the Eastern Seaboard batter short-haul destinations and ground outbound flights at Toronto International. Inside the terminal, tempers reach boiling point as delays and cancellations mount. Cargo handlers welcome some four-legged passengers as engineers carry out vital maintenance on a Dreamliner 787. Airfield Maintenance teams work around the clock to melt mountains of snow.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: It takes a mountain of jalapenos to keep up with demand for Chi Chis delicious salsa verde; satisfy your sweet tooth with these hand-crafted and hand-made pecan pralines from Savannah; and find out how a tangy sauce helped put this major league snack on the map.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: Food Factory USA samples some of Wisconsins favorite foods: Three million deep-fried cheese curds are produced here every day; it takes a mountain of pecans to keep up with demand for these cow patties; and, learn the science behind these pop-in-your-mouth candy crystals.

programme.title: Food Factory USA
programme.desc: On this episode of Food Factory USA: Meet the great grandson and learn the distilled secrets of legendary Kentucky bourbon maker Jim Beam; TruMoo chocolate milk is produced and blended by the chocolatey-delicious truckload; and more than a million of Tinas Burritos are hand-rolled every day - ole!

programme.title: Megastructures
programme.desc: Exciting documentary series that shows viewers some extreme and extraordinary construction projects- the biggest, tallest, longest or deepest in the world, and the machines that are used to create such amazing structures. The series features interviews with designers and project managers, who present the problems of construction and the methodology or techniques used to overcome obstacles. Some megastructures included in the series are US Navys aircraft carrier, the USS Ronald Reagan, highway with no speed limit built in Germany, undersea tunnel built between France and United Kingdom, worlds longest suspension bridge in Japan, twin tower skyscraper in Kuala Lumpur, etc.

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond reveals the engineering inspirations behind the tallest road bridge in the world - the Millau Viaduct, in France. He fires three quarters of a million volts from his finger tips to see how the power of lightning cut the steel structure quickly and accurately. The huge piers - 340 metres high, and which would look down on the Eiffel Tower - were positioned to millimetre accuracy with the system that located lost nuclear submarines. The longest road-deck in the world was launched along the top of the piers - and required the slipperiest substance known to man - Teflon; not even a gecko can stick to it. Steel cables hold the bridge in shape - born of a series of mining accidents. And to allow the bridge to expand a metre and a half in the summer sun the engineers turned to an ancient Celtic boat-building technique which can make concrete as bendy as wood.

programme.title: Engineering Connections
programme.desc: Richard Hammond stands atop on the Wembley roof, in front of its record breaking arch to discover the Engineering Connections behind the new high tech home of English football. Richard reveals how the architects and engineers, under pressure to maintain Wembleys iconic status as a world class sporting and music venue, drew inspiration from a rock climbing knot, the first glider to carry a man, a high powered medieval crossbow, stealth aircraft technology and Archimedes buoyancy theory that surfaced over two thousand years ago.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler: JFK Airport
programme.desc: HSI Miami investigates two separate maritime smuggling cases, and seizes more than 450 kilograms of cocaine off of a yacht bringing-in drugs from the Caribbean. CBP cracks down on the illegal importation of prescription medications, due to concerns for peoples health and safety. And HSI New York arrests a cocaine courier fromCuracao, as part of a two-year investigation into a large-scale drug smuggling organization. APPROVEDLine Description: HSI pursues multiple cases of cocaine smuggled from the Caribbean aboard boats. CBP makes large-scale seizures of medications without aprescription.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Lost Cities with Albert Lin
programme.desc: Lost Cities combines hi-tech archaeology, breath-taking visuals and genuine exploration to make headline-grabbing discoveries. Lost Cities brings adventure, science and archaeology together through our host Albert Lin. Our ambitious approach applies 3D scanning to some of the most extraordinary sites of antiquity. This series will deliver powerful, emotional stories with hi-tech imagery to bring the mysteries of the past vividly to life.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Join Professor Bettany Hughes as she explores the treasures of the iconic and tragic city of Pompeii. Pompeii is unlike anywhere else: an entire Roman city, buried in disaster, but preserved for the rest of time. From its famous villas to tragic human casts, the streets and houses of Pompeii offer a mesmerising window into the life and times of the ancient Romans. Now, Bettany sets out to choose just ten treasures which encapsulate the glory of this incredible city. Watch as Bettany explore Abundance Street, the incredible ancient Roman shopping mall brought back to life with cutting-edge VR; and the Baths, a key place for hot gossip. She meets experts in archaeology and science alike, determined to piece together the facts of the fateful night in 79 AD. At the end of the episode, Bettany comes face-to-face with the Resin Lady - an extraordinary cast preserved in wax and resin, and a haunting reminder of the disaster that engulfed the city. Looking through the allure of the ancient city, Bettany is always mindful of the people who suffered at the hands of Mount Vesuvius. She meets experts in archaeology and science alike, determined to piece together the facts of the fateful night in 79 AD. With fascinating interviews, and access to the very latest discoveries, join Bettany in her ultimate countdown of historys most famous city.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes returns to explore the treasures of the iconic and tragic city of Pompeii. Pompeii is unlike anywhere else: an entire Roman city, buried in disaster, but preserved for the rest of time. From its famous villas to tragic human casts, the streets and houses of Pompeii offer a mesmerising window into the life and times of the ancient Romans. Now, Bettany sets out to choose just ten treasures which encapsulate the glory of this incredible city. Watch as Bettany takes the viewer through an extraordinary countdown of mosaics, villas, and streets to get to the heart of daily life on the eve of Pompeiis deadly eruption. Shell explore the heart-breaking Lupanare brothel, the oldest surviving purpose-built brothel from the Roman Empire ;the House of Menander, an exquisite example of luxury Roman living; and the Ampitheatre, where recent discoveries have shed light on the extraordinary preparations that were necessary for its gladiators. Looking through the allure of the ancient city, Bettany is always mindful of the people who suffered at the hands of Mount Vesuvius. She meets experts in archaeology and science alike, determined to piece together the facts of the fateful night in 79 AD. In an extraordinary climax, Bettany takes to a helicopter, as she seeks to understand with the scale of disaster, and the devastation it wrought. With fascinating interviews, brilliant insight, and access to the very latest discoveries, join Bettany in her ultimate countdown of historys most famous city.

programme.title: Rome Underground
programme.desc: Featuring the parallel stories of a supersize building project and a jaw-dropping archaeological adventure, Rome Underground takes viewers on an immersive journey deep under the Eternal City — revealing how the construction of a 26-kilometer subway line through the heart of historic Rome has literally unearthed some of the most important discoveries of the modern age. At the intersection of technology and archaeology, this documentary chronicles the ambitious mega-project from every angle. With state-of-the-art modelling and 3D animation, it brings the ancient world vividly to life.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Just minutes from touching down, China Airlines Flight 140 falls out of the sky at Japans Nagoya Airport. By morning, investigators are already sifting through the charred debris on the runway, but what they find only deepens the mystery. At first it looks as though the pilots are entirely to blame for the disaster, but by the end of the exhaustive two-year investigation, its clear the causes are far more complex.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: En route to Boise, Idaho, Continental Airlines Flight 1713 is delayed on the tarmac in Denver where controllers struggle to keep departures on schedule amid heavy snow. When the plane is finally cleared for take-off, the DC-9 barely lifts off the ground before its banks sharply and crashes. Investigators find nothing wrong with the aircraft itself, but what they eventually uncover changes commercial flight forever.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes returns to explore the extraordinary and captivating mummies of Ancient Egypt. Egypt has a history like no other: nestling between the desert and the Nile, its extraordinary pyramids, soaring temples, and hidden tombs astonish and captivate. But nothing brings Egypts past back to life like the mummies that survive it. Wrapped, embalmed, and buried with treasure for thousands of years, each mummy tells the story of the people - the criminals, priests, children and pharaohs - who lived the history weve come to know. Watch as Bettany takes the viewer through an extraordinary countdown of the faces behind the history, as she reveals stories of glimmering treasure, journeys into the afterlife, and cruel revenge - some of which are only coming to light after thousands of years.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes returns to explore the extraordinary and captivating mummies of Ancient Egypt. Egypt has a history like no other: nestling between the desert and the Nile, its extraordinary pyramids, soaring temples, and hidden tombs astonish and captivate. But nothing brings Egypts past back to life like the mummies that survive it. Wrapped, embalmed, and buried with treasure for thousands of years, each mummy tells the story of the people - the criminals, priests, children and pharaohs - who made the history weve come to know. Watch as Bettany takes the viewer through an extraordinary countdown of the faces behind the history, as she reveals stories of glimmering treasure, journeys into the afterlife, and cruel revenge - some of which are only coming to light after thousands of years.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: At its height in the early 16th century, the temples and palaces of Cuzco overflowed with fine goods and precious metals. The wealth of the Incas even helped inspire the legend of El Dorado. Meet the most powerful Inca emperor: Huayna Capac, known for his violent and ruthless rule. Over his 30-year reign, Huayna Capac spent long periods campaigning in the north of his empire, conquering new lands and suppressing rebellions. With an iron grip, he maintained control, enforced mandatory labor, exported agricultural technologies, relocated hundreds of thousands of people across the Andes, and centralized South Americas production in Cuzco.

programme.title: Incas: The Rise and Fall
programme.desc: From the arrival of Francisco Pizarro in South America to the fall of the Inca Empire, less than 10 years passed. But how could such a powerful empire commanding over 30,000 soldiers collapse so quickly to just 200 Spanish conquistadors? The tragic fate of the last three Inca sovereigns, three brothers, each played a decisive role in the brutal downfall. The conquistadors were better equipped, master tacticians, and aided by rebellious Indigenous peoples. Some Incas resisted, but within a few decades, the Spanish wiped out the legacy of the Sons of the Sun. Thanks to the latest scientific advances and ultra-realistic 3D reconstructions—from Cuzco to the Chilean desert, via Cajamarca, and the Pacific coast—this is the brutal fall of the Empire of the Sun.

programme.title: Petra: Secrets of the Ancient Builders
programme.desc: In the heart of the Jordanian desert, the ancient city of Petra is full of mysteries. How was this architectural prowess achieved more than 2,000 years ago?

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: New discoveries and cutting-edge research reveal the origins of the greatest monument built by the Roman Empire - the Colosseum. Investigations across Italy explore the roots of this symbol of Roman power and the gladiator games that were held there. New archaeological findings at the Colosseum uncover evidence revealing the true extent of the structure and how it may have looked at its opening games.

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: Cutting-edge research reveals how Romes emperors used the Colosseum to unite vast provinces and drive their empire to the peak of its power. Archaeologists dig beneath the Colosseum itself to reveal the true extent of the Roman games, discover the secrets of the gladiators, and unearth the remains of ancient beasts whose slaughter was at the centre of Romes most iconic landmark.

programme.title: Colosseum
programme.desc: The Colosseum and its gladiatorial games stand as a symbol of Romes power and reach for over a century until coins, recently discovered at the site, indicate an empire in crisis. What role does the Colosseum play in Romes decline and fall? Investigations take archaeologists to ruins in Austria, Tunisia, and Rome, as they uncover the story of the empires collapse.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Join Professor Bettany Hughes as she explores the treasures of the iconic and tragic city of Pompeii. Pompeii is unlike anywhere else: an entire Roman city, buried in disaster, but preserved for the rest of time. From its famous villas to tragic human casts, the streets and houses of Pompeii offer a mesmerising window into the life and times of the ancient Romans. Now, Bettany sets out to choose just ten treasures which encapsulate the glory of this incredible city. Watch as Bettany explore Abundance Street, the incredible ancient Roman shopping mall brought back to life with cutting-edge VR; and the Baths, a key place for hot gossip. She meets experts in archaeology and science alike, determined to piece together the facts of the fateful night in 79 AD. At the end of the episode, Bettany comes face-to-face with the Resin Lady - an extraordinary cast preserved in wax and resin, and a haunting reminder of the disaster that engulfed the city. Looking through the allure of the ancient city, Bettany is always mindful of the people who suffered at the hands of Mount Vesuvius. She meets experts in archaeology and science alike, determined to piece together the facts of the fateful night in 79 AD. With fascinating interviews, and access to the very latest discoveries, join Bettany in her ultimate countdown of historys most famous city.

programme.title: Greatest Treasures of the Ancient World
programme.desc: Professor Bettany Hughes returns to explore the treasures of the iconic and tragic city of Pompeii. Pompeii is unlike anywhere else: an entire Roman city, buried in disaster, but preserved for the rest of time. From its famous villas to tragic human casts, the streets and houses of Pompeii offer a mesmerising window into the life and times of the ancient Romans. Now, Bettany sets out to choose just ten treasures which encapsulate the glory of this incredible city. Watch as Bettany takes the viewer through an extraordinary countdown of mosaics, villas, and streets to get to the heart of daily life on the eve of Pompeiis deadly eruption. Shell explore the heart-breaking Lupanare brothel, the oldest surviving purpose-built brothel from the Roman Empire ;the House of Menander, an exquisite example of luxury Roman living; and the Ampitheatre, where recent discoveries have shed light on the extraordinary preparations that were necessary for its gladiators. Looking through the allure of the ancient city, Bettany is always mindful of the people who suffered at the hands of Mount Vesuvius. She meets experts in archaeology and science alike, determined to piece together the facts of the fateful night in 79 AD. In an extraordinary climax, Bettany takes to a helicopter, as she seeks to understand with the scale of disaster, and the devastation it wrought. With fascinating interviews, brilliant insight, and access to the very latest discoveries, join Bettany in her ultimate countdown of historys most famous city.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt
programme.desc: Shrouded by mystery, the Lost Treasures of Egypt clears the sand away from your eyes in revealing the secrets of this Ancient Civilisation. From the Valley of Kings to the Pyramids of Giza, we uncover hidden tombs and foretell the stories of ruling pharaohs through the artefacts, that we find along the way. Following the excavations of international experts, we unearth historical context at various archaeological sites. At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: The Hidden Ships of the Gold Rush drains the streets of San Francisco, the Sacramento River and the icy wastes of the Klondike, northern Canada, to tell the true story of nineteenth-century gold mania. In the race to be first to the gold fields hundreds of thousands of people from across the world head West. Risks are run, countless men, women and children die, fortunes are made and lost - and amid it all, the modern-day United States is born.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Just 4 minutes after take-off from Singapore Changi Airport, on 4 November 2010, Qantas Flight 32 suffered an uncontained failure in one of its engines. The failure was the first of its kind for the Airbus A380, the worlds first double-deck jet airliner. Shrapnel from the engine damaged the fuel system and led to a series of failures, severely compromising the aircraft. The crew spent almost two tense hours in the air before navigating a successful emergency landing, saving everyone onboard. In this episode, Captain Richard de Crespigny shares his account of heroically handling what could have been certain disaster..

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: A small commuter plane begins a short flight when disaster strikes. Moments after takeoff, the nose of the aircraft pitches up dramatically. The flight crew struggles for control. The plane is just 350 meters in the air when it stalls, rolls to the left, and plummets to the ground. It slams into a packed hangar, killing everyone on board. Combing through the wreckage, investigators find a single clue that leads them to uncover a string of errors and faulty assumptions that have been putting millions of passengers at risk for years.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. programme.title: Science of Stupid

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz take on one of the most iconic cars to have ever come out of Germany, a BMW E30 Alpina. The car belongs to car obsessive Maz, a town planner from Walsall, whose dream to restore the car came to an end when he was struck down with a near fatal genetic disorder. Once the car arrives at the workshop not only do the boys discover that its full of rot, but that it might not actually be the special edition it proports to be. Alpina or not Alpina - that is the question!

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Making motoring dreams come true for an eighth season award winning Car SOS is back, and this time its bigger and better than ever. Everyones favourite petrol heads Fuzz Townshend and Tim Shaw continue their mission to seek out classic cars with deserving owners. Using all their guile and restoration knowledge their aim is to sneak away clapped out classics without their owners knowing then in a blizzard of grease and grime and hard graft get the much loved motors back where they deserve to be, on the road .In this series the boys take on their biggest challenges ever. Chronic rust, hard to find parts and broken engines test the boys to their limits. Car ranging across eight decades from a vintage tourer to a 1990s Japanese supercar, from an iconic German sports coupe to a very rare British rally winner, and, for their lucky owners the surprise they will never forget. There will be tears, there will be laughter on this automotive rollercoaster and one thing that will be guaranteed - there will be some very beautiful cars.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Tim and Fuzz are challenged to take on probably their most obscure car to date - a little known Cannon trials competition car. Car trialling is the worlds second oldest motorsport, and involves taking specially adapted cars up steep slippery hills and through thick mud courses, it was huge in the 1950s and 60s but today is less well known. Cannon cars were probably the most famous and successful cars on the trialling circuit - all hand-made by Tasmanian farmer Mike Cannon, who settled in the UK in the 1950s to build cars. One of the most successful cars that Cannon produced was known as Goldfinger as it was built in 1964 - the same year the Bond film of the same name was released - and it is that very car that Tim and Fuzz have been called in to fix. The car is owned by former bus driver Dean - a car trialling fanatic whose active life was tragically cut short eight years ago when he suffered a catastrophic stroke that resulted in him having an inability to communicate. Dean is now slowly recovering but the part of his brain that deals with speech was all but destroyed meaning he has had to relearn how to speak and also he still suffers regular seizures. In their quest to find out more about trialling Tim and Fuzz end up in a full blown event - you will have to watch the programme to find out how they did.

programme.title: Car S.O.S.
programme.desc: Brand new: Tim Shaw and Fuzz Townshend travel to Devon to steal away one of the fastest road cars of its time, a 1997 Mitsubishi Evo 4. In the 90s, the Evos dominated the World Rally circuits and the two litre road going versions were no less impressive, making it one of the most extreme cars available for purchase. The car that the boys are taking on belongs to 60-year-old Gary, a petrolhead who loved his Evo and used it as his daily driver.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: "Ice Road Rescue" portrays a group of heroic tow truck rescue workers. When winter hits Norway the transport roads turn into treacherous bobsleigh tracks. Every day the rescuers fight to keep this routes open by rescuing heavy trailers stuck in the mountain terrain. Winter storms, avalanches and lack of daylight through the winter season are just some of the challenges they have to face, working close to the polar circle. Extreme winter conditions that often make them risk their lives. "Ice Road Rescue" shows the ultimate man versus nature.

programme.title: Ice Road Rescue

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: Guarded by the Terracotta Warriors, the tomb of the First Emperor is so revered that it has never been opened. But now, for the first time ever, Sam Willis and his team of experts use new laser drone technology to investigate. What they reveal has never been seen before, and it provides new insight into what lies inside the tomb itself, as they piece together the Emperors vast mausoleum - an entire, stunning city of the dead.

programme.title: Ancient China from Above
programme.desc: In episode two, we take to the air to reveal how modern China lives,eats,works,travels andplays on a mega scale. We will learn how this nation has transformed its cities and infrastructure in three decades while still retaining its traditions. We gain a greater understanding of how Chinas industrialization impacts the planet in negative ways, and how they are seeking solutions. And we find out what a billion plus population does for fun and how it crosses the countrys huge expanses.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Lost Treasures of Egypt

At the end of this series, you should be enlightened with numerous Egyptian theories such as "mummification" and the Curse of the Afterlife. With royalty as Tutankhamun and Cleopatra, we explore the impacts these figures had at the time and the lasting dynasty they have since left behind, for modern Egypt.

programme.title: Quest for King Solomons Treasure
programme.desc: Countless treasure-seekers have set off in search of King Solomons mines a quest inspired by the Bibles account of spectacular temples adorned in glittering gold and copper. To date, any evidence that supports Solomons existence is regarded as highly controversial. Expeditions in 2010 revealed groundbreaking new clues buried in the Jordanian desert for centuries.

programme.title: Maya Underworld: The Real Doomsday
programme.desc: Host Diego Buñuel ventures deep underwater to vast graveyards of Maya human sacrifices and through dangerous underground tunnels to new revelations about the Maya calendar. Ground breaking National Geographic technology, a brilliant SUNSPHERE that turns darkness into day, makes his quest unique. The search leads him to understand more about the mysterious collapse of Maya civilization over 1000 years ago. And how the Maya may have forecast the same fate for us. Is the Maya Doomsday prediction scheduled to happen on December 21, 2012? Should we bother buying Christmas presents? Buñuel has the answers.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: A Homeland Security Investigations stakeout in San Diego leads to a car chase, a takedown and the discovery of nearly $500K in meth and fentanyl. In El Paso, Customs and Border Protection uncovers bundles of cash and bricks of cocaine concealed in vehicles crossing the border. And in Philadelphia, Customs and Border Protection cracks down on undeclared merchandise on international flights, uncovering thousands of dollars in suspected counterfeit goods from Turkey.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Draining Lake Michigan uncovers Chicagos secret history. The latest sonar technology exposes a catastrophe that kills 300, solves a tragic Christmas mystery, uncovers a game-changing naval training programme from World War 2 and reveals an engineering marvel that stops the fastest growing city in the world from choking to death. Chicagos spectacular story is all about ambition and risk - only sometimes those risks end in disaster.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Plane Crash Recreated Plane Crash Recreated 10 x 60 As passengers, every time we board an aeroplane, we place our trust in the pilot, airline and the aircraft manufacturer and while flying remains the safest form of travel, accidents still happen. Plane Crash Recreated will explain and investigate the worlds most infamous plane crashes. Using survivor stories, expert interviews and black-box data, we will experience the final harrowing moments on board these notorious flights. But could the outcome have been different? Using a team of highly skilled test pilots and our own cutting edge flight simulator, we show you the extreme pressure inside the cockpit. When faced with failure, our military, commercial, aerobatic and test-pilots will need to make split-second life-or-death decisions. How will their vastly different training affect their outcome? And with the benefit of hindsight, what would they do differently?

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Every time a plane crashes, the world takes notice. And so do the experts whose job it is to figure out what happened. Air Crash Investigation uncovers the truth behind the most legendary aviation disasters, and every episode features eyewitness accounts, captivating reenactments, state-of-the-art CGI, and interviews with the investigators who ultimately determined what went wrong. This season on Air Crash Investigation: Conflicting stories emerge after a Swedish cargo plane spirals to the ground; an African airliner crashes in the wilderness and the cause proves too sinister to be believed; and, when a Pakistani passenger jet disappears on approach to Kathmandu, Nepalese investigators must determine how it ended up on a crash course with the Himalayas.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Madagascars Weirdest Compilation
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Madagascar is an island nation set adrift for millions of years, leaving its wildlife in extreme isolation and causing some bizarre adaptations. Many of the creatures here are found nowhere else on earth.

programme.title: South Americas Weirdest Animals
programme.desc: South America is a rich and diverse land. Stunning landscapes harbor elusive critters that have evolved to thrive here. But survival is not assured because the abundant prey is closely followed by powerful predators.

programme.title: Worlds Weirdest
programme.desc: Worlds Weirdest is a documentary series revolving around the strangest, freakiest, weirdest animals and their behaviors in the animal kingdom. Take this amazing journey to the animal world and have a look at creatures who survive in extreme environments, alien-looking body parts and camouflage, fish that can change its sex, toads that explode, koalas and their disgusting diet and all kinds of other weirdest creatures Mother Nature has to offer.

programme.title: Tree Kangaroos: Ghosts of the Forest
programme.desc: Seldom seen and very rarely filmed in their natural environment, Lumholtz tree kangaroos are the ghosts of the north Queensland forests. This film follows the intimate lives of these tree-climbing specialists in the wilderness of the Atherton Tableland.

programme.title: Madagascars Weirdest Compilation
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. Madagascar is an island nation set adrift for millions of years, leaving its wildlife in extreme isolation and causing some bizarre adaptations. Many of the creatures here are found nowhere else on earth.

programme.title: Winters Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: Winter is the most punishing of seasons, a time of year when many animals seek shelter in order to hibernate, but others must face the harshness of their environment. This documentary series showcases the ruthless beauty of this icy season, revealing the animals who thrive in their freezing conditions and the animals who simply fight for survival. When the season finally passes spring is reborn, and it is a celebration for those who managed to survive unscathed.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor

Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon of Guyana
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In Guyanas rainforest, one of the last paradises on Earth, a young jaguar must prove his worth to claim his throne.

programme.title: Mystery Gorilla
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In the forest of northern Congo, more than 100,000 western lowland gorillas have largely managed to avoid human contact. What theyve been hiding is astounding.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics
programme.desc: Explore the many ways wild cats go in for the kill. Cats rarely seen in action, such as the marbled cat, the fishing cat and the sand cat, will all be featured in Cat Attack-tics. Classic Nat Geo footage is mixed with high-tech graphics, freeze frames and photo finishes to magnify the killer weaponry.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon of Guyana
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In Guyanas rainforest, one of the last paradises on Earth, a young jaguar must prove his worth to claim his throne.

programme.title: Mystery Gorilla
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In the forest of northern Congo, more than 100,000 western lowland gorillas have largely managed to avoid human contact. What theyve been hiding is astounding.

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
programme.desc: The Nicobar Islands were significantly impacted by the massive tsunami of 2004. This documentary is a compelling exploration of natures ability to adapt to millions of years of gradual tectonic change and a sudden natural disaster, and a journey into a world few people are fortunate enough to see.

programme.title: Primate Planet
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. From tropical treetops to snowy peaks, Primate Planet takes you on a whirlwind tour of the wild world of primates, uncovering their unique behaviors, strong family bonds, and surprising personalities.

programme.title: Cat Attack-Tics
programme.desc: Explore the many ways wild cats go in for the kill. Cats rarely seen in action, such as the marbled cat, the fishing cat and the sand cat, will all be featured in Cat Attack-tics. Classic Nat Geo footage is mixed with high-tech graphics, freeze frames and photo finishes to magnify the killer weaponry.

programme.title: Serengeti Speed Queen
programme.desc: Nzuri, a first-time Mom, is forced to add strategy to speed in order to avoid predators, feed her cubs and steer them successfully to adulthood

programme.title: Desert Lions: Surviving At Skeleton Coast
programme.desc: In this true story, lion researcher Dr. Philip Stander follows three orphaned lion cubs from birth to adulthood as they navigate the complexity of survival in one of the worlds most unforgiving environments, Namibias deadly Skeleton Coast. He gets up close and personal to unlock secrets of their world and witness the amazing adaptability of these special cats.

programme.title: Pride
programme.desc: The story here examines the tactics used by a pride of South African lions as they hunt three distinct prey animals in the Singita Game Reserve. Well analyze the Prides unique strategies as they pursue zebra, impala, and ultimately the tallest land animal, the giraffe.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon of Guyana
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In Guyanas rainforest, one of the last paradises on Earth, a young jaguar must prove his worth to claim his throne.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: Heart and Foal. Drs. Ben and Erin assist a kitten with a dangly leg, save a St. Bernard puppy in the throes of kidney failure, and outfit a Bichon with some cool new shades. On the farm, the docs offer up their veterinary services to Bens brother.

programme.title: Heartland Docs
programme.desc: The Eagle Has Landed. Despite challenging weather conditions, Drs. Ben and Erin Schroeder treat a wild bald eagle that needs immediate care before returning to the wild. The Schroeders also make a farm call to vaccinate a pair of emus.

programme.title: Mystery Gorilla
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In the forest of northern Congo, more than 100,000 western lowland gorillas have largely managed to avoid human contact. What theyve been hiding is astounding.

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
programme.desc: The Nicobar Islands were significantly impacted by the massive tsunami of 2004. This documentary is a compelling exploration of natures ability to adapt to millions of years of gradual tectonic change and a sudden natural disaster, and a journey into a world few people are fortunate enough to see.

programme.title: Primate Planet
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. From tropical treetops to snowy peaks, Primate Planet takes you on a whirlwind tour of the wild world of primates, uncovering their unique behaviors, strong family bonds, and surprising personalities.

programme.title: Jaguar: Jungle Icon of Guyana
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In Guyanas rainforest, one of the last paradises on Earth, a young jaguar must prove his worth to claim his throne.

programme.title: Mystery Gorilla
programme.desc: National Geographic Wild. In the forest of northern Congo, more than 100,000 western lowland gorillas have largely managed to avoid human contact. What theyve been hiding is astounding.

programme.title: Nicobar Islands: A Monkeys Long Tale
programme.desc: The Nicobar Islands were significantly impacted by the massive tsunami of 2004. This documentary is a compelling exploration of natures ability to adapt to millions of years of gradual tectonic change and a sudden natural disaster, and a journey into a world few people are fortunate enough to see.

programme.title: Africas Hunters
programme.desc: Large carnivores such as leopards, lions and hyenas are in constant competition for their next meal for their pack in Zambias Luangwa Valley. Following the lives of the wise old leopard Kamuti who rained over the prime territory in the Luangwa Valley for 10 years, a six-week-old lion cub and a clan of spotted hyenas, this documentary series allows audiences to see these magnificent animals like never before. With up-close imagery of animals existing within Luangwa Valley and their life in the wild, feel a part of the pack with Africas Hunters.

programme.title: Hostile Planet
programme.desc: HOSTILE PLANET is a ground-breaking wildlife series that explores Earths most hostile environments. Over the course of six episodes, we explore the extremes of deep, high, cold, hot, wet and dry and reveal the truly extraordinary ways in which animals have adapted to survive in the face of great adversity. Its always been a HOSTILE PLANET and yet, in the last 40 years, its got a whole lot tougher for the wildlife. The world has changed more in the last 40 years than at any time in the last 65 million. So animals in the most hostile places on Earth must adapt in the blink of an evolutionary eye. Facing everything from intrinsically hostile habitats and brutally punishing weather to the unrelenting threat of predators and intense competition for resources, their challenge is simple: adapt or die.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. "Prairie Dog Manor" showcases the unique behaviour of these special animals and highlights the different relationships that exist between the clan members from Valles Caldera National Preserve. Beginning with the prairie dogs preparing for the coming winter, Carl and the pups get ready for hibernation. But they face danger from an unlikely source as deadly predators forge an alliance to threaten every dog in the territory. Further episodes explore the mating season when the warm weather arrives and battles commence between the males to earn the right to mate with the females. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Follow the exploits of these cute creatures from northern New Mexico. Soon, the females are pregnant and new pups arrive and the whole cycle starts again.

programme.title: Africas Hidden Wonders
programme.desc: A land full of extreme environments and teeming with iconic wildlife, Africa holds a fascination like no other continent. This series takes the viewer on a journey from harsh desert landscapes to towering peaks, and from vast, sprawling grasslands to raging river torrents. The three episodes cover the mist-covered jungles and mountains of Rwanda and the great apes who call it home; the largest desert in the world, the Sahara, where the scarcity of water and food make life a daily challenge for the creatures who compete for them; and the cradle of humanity, Ethiopia, a weather-ravaged land full of natural beauty and unique wildlife.

programme.desc: After 30 years of war and destruction, Gorongosa National Park in Mozambique has undergone a remarkable restoration. Herbivores once again bound across the plains, but hunters have been slower to return, leaving the park out of balance...until now!

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The African Savanna is home to the ultimate animal sisterhood; a family of elephants. A new baby will need the familys support to make it through her early vulnerable months. While mom learns how to care for her, it is the babys grandmother, the matriarch, that must protect her. Facing predators, drought and a rapidly changing world can this new baby and her family of iconic females survive?

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: In the heart of Tanzania, the towering walls of the Ngorongoro crater sets a stage for one of the most infamous rivalries in the natural world. The sisters of a formidable lion pride clash with a hyena clan ruled by an all-powerful queen. The sisterhood share responsibility, while the hyena queen must play clan politics and enforce a strict hierarchy to keep her crown.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ceļo pa lietusmežu, sacerot dziesmiņu tētim, lai kopā ar viņu nosvinētu Tēta un Doras dienu! Dora ir gatava Čurro fiestai, taču izrādās, ka visus našķus ir apēduši Pirātrukši. Dora dodas meklēt īpašu dārgumu lādi, kurā paslēpti zelta čurro.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora uzzina, ka viņas vecmamma nav svinējusi savus Pieaugšanas svētkus, un sarīko viņai pārsteiguma ballīti ar īpašu kleitu, diadēmu un kurpēm! Doras draugam Koko nav aizraujoša stāsta, ar ko izklaidēt biedrus, tāpēc viņi dodas pie Pastāstu koka!

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pastāsta pārējiem, cik vareni bija Da Vinči izgudrojumi un nu katrs grib izgudrot ko savu. Ģēniju ir maz, bet ir jautri izgudrot. // Bērniem jāizvēlas - doties baseinā vai izbraukt ar riteņiem. Uzreiz izveidojas divas frontes un tikai Barbazū spēj nosvērt izvēles svarus.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērniem patīk nakts pasaciņas, bet ne tad, ja tās visu laiku atkārtojas. Barbabella pavada nemierīgu nakti kukaiņu dēļ.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbatētis grib iemācīt bērniem cept maizi, bet nekas nenotiek, kā plānots.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad futbola laukumā sarodas trušu ģimene, Rabla komanda liek lietā prasmes un izdomā jaunu sportu - trušbolu!

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Super Duper Zaķu līga ir zaķu grupa, kas aizstāv pasauli no dažādiem blēžiem. Viņi cīnās gan pret kāriem kosmosa pirātiem, gan lavas briesmoņiem, izmantojot savas superspējas, lai aizsargātu patiesību, taisnīgumu un brīvo atpūtas laiku.

programme.title: Super Duper Zaķu Līga
programme.desc: Super Duper Zaķu līga ir zaķu grupa, kas aizstāv pasauli no dažādiem blēžiem. Viņi cīnās gan pret kāriem kosmosa pirātiem, gan lavas briesmoņiem, izmantojot savas superspējas, lai aizsargātu patiesību, taisnīgumu un brīvo atpūtas laiku.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Sekojot iemīļotā detektīva pēdās, Barbabravo meklē noziegumu, kas jāatklāj. Vai viņš spēs atklāt noslēpumaino ledus skulptūras pazušanu? Barbabērni gatavo savu mīļāko varoņu iedvesmotus tērpus, taču varoņi neeksistē bez ļaundariem...

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni laimē skārienpaliktni. Visi grab to izmantot, tāpēc čiepj viens pēc otra. Barbazū krāj ūsainu slavenību bildes. Diemžēl nekur nevar atrast pēdējo: Čārlzu Pakavu-Ūsaini. Viņam ir aizdomas par sazvērestību...

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un omīte ir dārgumu meklējumos. Ir Rūkoņas svētki, un Tims grib, lai viņa rūciens ir labākais. Tims, Tomijs un Tija savā mājā atrod pazudušu mamutu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rivera grib uzņemt krītošas zvaigznes foto, tāpēc kucēni ceļ observatoriju. Kucēni apmaldās uz dabas takas un rod veidu, kā nokļūt mājās.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pirmās Celtnieklīča bibliotēkas būvēšana ir bišu pilna. Tas pieprasa īpaši saldu celtniecības risinājumu. / Vectēvs Grants māca Čārdžeram visus savus labākos deju soļus lielām deju sacensībām. Vai noklīdušas disko bumbas dēļ viņi neiegūs pirmo vietu?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora ceļo pa lietusmežu, sacerot dziesmiņu tētim, lai kopā ar viņu nosvinētu Tēta un Doras dienu! Dora ir gatava Čurro fiestai, taču izrādās, ka visus našķus ir apēduši Pirātrukši. Dora dodas meklēt īpašu dārgumu lādi, kurā paslēpti zelta čurro.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Slēpošanas laikā Barbapapas uzceļ milzīgu iglū. Barbabravo and Barbalibs sacenšas drosmīgumā. Barbagudrais rada putekļu sūkšanas robotu, kas lieliski spēlē futbolu. Barbabērni sarīko spēli pret robotiem.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbagudrais pārklāj māju ar burvju produktu, lai novērstu ūdens sūci. Nākamajā dienā māja saplok kā balons. Putns uzvij ligzdu uz Barbazū vēdera. Barbazū grib kļūt par lieu koku, lai sniegtu patvērumu dzīvniekiem. Situācija kļūst sarežģīta.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs un Tija atrod pazudušu rotaļlietu un sola atgriezt to saimniekam. Kaja gaida, kad brauks ar Nebulatoru, bet Tims nav drošs. Tims un Kaja cenšas nofotografēt maldinošu Kosmosa vaboli.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ātri jānomazgā Greitvejas dubļainais motocikls! Vīlers un suņi ķeras pie darba, lai uzbūvētu risinājumu pirms sacensībām. Vectēva Grants īpašā diena! Bet, kad nepieciešama suņu palīdzība, viņiem jāmaina vectēva dienas plāni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ziepains negadījums izraisa slidenas sekas visā Celtnieklīcī. Vai suņuki paspēs tās novērst pirms mēres Greitvejas lielā lēciena?

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: Rabla brālēns Čārdžers apciemo Piedzīvojumu līci tieši laikā, lai izpalīdzētu, kad Hamdingera izraisīts geizers izraisa haosu, kura rezultātā tiek sagrauta mistera Portera kafejnīca. Ar Rabla mašīnu, divi celtnieku ķepaiņi visu glābj, atjaunojot kafejnīcu. // Kad Piedzīvojumu līcī notiek "Spīdīgākā vāģa konkurss", mērs Hamdingers izdomā plānu, kā sabotēt Vinniju Viningtoni un citus dalībniekus, tāpēc Ķepu patruļai viss jāglābj.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš, Giljermo un Isabela rotaļājas ārā, taču sākas lietus. Dora dvīņiem pastāsta, ka tādā laikā var laimēties ieraudzīt varavīksni. Varavīksne tiešām parādās, tomēr tai trūkst vairāku krāsu: zilās, sarkanās un dzeltenās! Dora dodas uz Isas dārzu, lai aizņemtos krāsas no košajām puķēm. Uzveikusi Garnadzi, Dora aiznes krāsas Varavīksnei, kura iepriecina dvīņus ar savu košo spožumu. // Zābaciņš ļoti lepojas ar savu krāsaino gumiju bumbu un vēlas to izmēģināt beisbola spēlē. Taču bumba aizlido tālu projām! Karte pastāsta, ka tā nonākusi Kaimiņu mežā, kur dzīvo Simtkāje Sintija. Zābaciņam ir bail uzrunāt daudzkājaino kaimiņieni, tomēr Dora viņu iedrošina. Galu galā Sintija labprāt atdod bumbu... un pat iesaistās draugu spēlē!

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs. Tims cenšas atpūsties, bet Tijai ir citi plāni. Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbazū gatavs palīdzēt, bet Barbagudrais un Barbabella ļaunprātīgi izmanto viņa labestību un padara viņu traku. Barbazū nejauši atklāj spēju atdarināt Barbatēti. Viņš to izmanto, lai sadalītu darbus brāļiem un māsām. Vai viņi to uzzinās?

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Makss atklāj, ka daļa mistiskās kartes ir kļuvusi redzama. Haizivsuņa komanda cenšas atklāt pārējo karti.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Olija uzzina, ka viņai skolā ir jāuzstājas daiļslidošanā un viņa pierunā Haizivsuni viņai palīdzēt.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Komanda ir gatava doties uz slepeno salu, bet tad izrādās, ka Barbai ir bail kuģot pa ledainām jūrām.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Gabriels rīko Talantu šovu, taču Ātrummeistars izdomā plānu, lai viņš būtu vienīgais dalībnieks. Cetnieklīča svētkos dziedās Sjerra Spīdošā, un vajadzīgi jauni instrumenti.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Ar steigu jāuzbūvē liels dambis, kas pilsētu pasargās no plūdiem Fermeri Zoju piemeklē likstas - ražu apēd neatlaidīga vāvere.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Barbamazuļi atrod ziloņu mazuli un slepeni par to rūpējas. Kā Barbatētis un Barbamamma reaģēs uz Borisu? Zilonis Boriss ilgojas pēc mājām. Barbapapas nolemj vest viņu atpakaļ uz Āfriku. Turpat viņi palīdz Borisam pielāgoties.

programme.title: Barbapapas - Lielā ģimene!
programme.desc: Kamēr ģimene veido keramikas izstrādājumus, Barbabravo un Barbagudrais mēģina uzstādīt pasaules rekordu ar siera suflē. Barbapapas nolemj doties uz parku. Kamēr brālis un māsa spēlējas, Barbaliba mēģina visu kontrolēt.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims nolemj pierādīt, ka Kajas tētis ir kapteinis Dinostārs. Tims cenšas atpūsties, bet Tijai ir citi plāni. Tims nopērk labākos cepumus pilsētā, bet drīz saprot, ka citiem tos vajag vairāk nekā viņam.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Tomijs, Tija un tētis netiek prom attāla asteroīda.

programme.title: Tims Rekss kosmosā
programme.desc: Tims, Kaja un Tomijs cenšas dabūt laukā bumbu no mammas istabas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Cūciņa Pepa ir mīļa, ziņkārīga un aktīva pirmsskolniece, kura kopā ar māmiņu, tēti un brālīti Džordžu ik dienu uzzina daudz ko jaunu un aizraujošu. Pepas iecienītākās nodarbes ir rotaļāšanās, pārģērbšanās un lēkāšana pa dubļainām peļķēm, un viņas jautrie piedzīvojumi vienmēr beidzas ar skaļiem smieklu rukšķiem.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns

programme.title: Haizivsuns
